Some of the benefits of group work are that it prepares students for teamwork. something that they will probably encounter in the workplace. Also, work can be shared and it tends to produce more creative solutions to problems.However. we should be aware that conflicts may occur as individuals negotiate their place in the group and different personalities try to work together.
